recieved.message:
黑洞是宇宙中的一种极端密集的天体，其质量极大但体积相对较小，因此拥有非常强大的引力场。这个引力场强到连光线都无法逃逸，因此被称为“黑洞”。黑洞的存在最初是根据爱因斯坦的广义相对论预测出来的，后来通过多种天文观测得到了证实。

黑洞的边界称为事件视界，这是黑洞的“无回点”，任何物质或辐射一旦越过这个边界，就无法逃脱黑洞的引力，被永远吸入黑洞内部。黑洞内部的结构目前还不完全清楚，因为我们无法直接观测到事件视界之内的情况。

黑洞可以通过几种

code.name: code
code.value:
from typing import Optional, Union

from langchain.llms import BaseLLM
from langchain_community.chat_models.openai import ChatOpenAI

from langflow import CustomComponent
from langflow.field_typing import BaseLanguageModel, NestedDict


class ChatOpenAIComponent(CustomComponent):
    display_name = "ChatOpenAI"
    description = "`OpenAI` Chat large language models API."

    def build_config(self):
        return {
            "max_tokens": {
                "display_name": "Max Tokens",
                "field_type": "int",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
            },
            "model_kwargs": {
                "display_name": "Model Kwargs",
                "field_type": "NestedDict",
                "advanced": True,
                "required": False,
            },
            "model_name": {
                "display_name": "Model Name",
                "field_type": "str",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "options": [
                    "gpt-4-turbo-preview",
                    "gpt-4-0125-preview",
                    "gpt-4-1106-preview",
                    "gpt-4-vision-preview",
                    "gpt-3.5-turbo-0125",
                    "gpt-3.5-turbo-1106",
                ],
            },
            "openai_api_base": {
                "display_name": "OpenAI API Base",
                "field_type": "str",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "info": (
                    "The base URL of the OpenAI API. Defaults to https://api.openai.com/v1.\n\n"
                    "You can change this to use other APIs like JinaChat, LocalAI and Prem."
                ),
            },
            "openai_api_key": {
                "display_name": "OpenAI API Key",
                "field_type": "str",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "password": True,
            },
            "temperature": {
                "display_name": "Temperature",
                "field_type": "float",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "value": 0.7,
            },
        }

    def build(
        self,
        max_tokens: Optional[int] = 256,
        model_kwargs: NestedDict = {},
        model_name: str = "gpt-4-1106-preview",
        openai_api_base: Optional[str] = None,
        openai_api_key: Optional[str] = None,
        temperature: float = 0.7,
    ) -> Union[BaseLanguageModel, BaseLLM]:
        if not openai_api_base:
            openai_api_base = "https://api.openai.com/v1"
        return ChatOpenAI(
            max_tokens=max_tokens,
            model_kwargs=model_kwargs,
            model=model_name,
            base_url=openai_api_base,
            api_key=openai_api_key,
            temperature=temperature,
        )

openai_api_base.info:
The base URL of the OpenAI API. Defaults to https://api.openai.com/v1.

You can change this to use other APIs like JinaChat, LocalAI and Prem.
openai_api_base.name: openai_api_base

input_key.info: The variable to be used as Chat Input when more than one variable is available.
input_key.name: input_key

output_key.info: The variable to be used as Chat Output (e.g. answer in a ConversationalRetrievalChain)
output_key.name: output_key

from typing import Optional, Union

from langchain.llms import BaseLLM
from langchain_community.chat_models.openai import ChatOpenAI

from langflow import CustomComponent
from langflow.field_typing import BaseLanguageModel, NestedDict


class ChatOpenAIComponent(CustomComponent):
    display_name = "ChatOpenAI"
    description = "`OpenAI` Chat large language models API."

    def build_config(self):
        return {
            "max_tokens": {
                "display_name": "Max Tokens",
                "field_type": "int",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
            },
            "model_kwargs": {
                "display_name": "Model Kwargs",
                "field_type": "NestedDict",
                "advanced": True,
                "required": False,
            },
            "model_name": {
                "display_name": "Model Name",
                "field_type": "str",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "options": [
                    "gpt-4-turbo-preview",
                    "gpt-4-0125-preview",
                    "gpt-4-1106-preview",
                    "gpt-4-vision-preview",
                    "gpt-3.5-turbo-0125",
                    "gpt-3.5-turbo-1106",
                ],
            },
            "openai_api_base": {
                "display_name": "OpenAI API Base",
                "field_type": "str",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "info": (
                    "The base URL of the OpenAI API. Defaults to https://api.openai.com/v1.\n\n"
                    "You can change this to use other APIs like JinaChat, LocalAI and Prem."
                ),
            },
            "openai_api_key": {
                "display_name": "OpenAI API Key",
                "field_type": "str",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "password": True,
            },
            "temperature": {
                "display_name": "Temperature",
                "field_type": "float",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "value": 0.7,
            },
        }

    def build(
        self,
        max_tokens: Optional[int] = 256,
        model_kwargs: NestedDict = {},
        model_name: str = "gpt-4-1106-preview",
        openai_api_base: Optional[str] = None,
        openai_api_key: Optional[str] = None,
        temperature: float = 0.7,
    ) -> Union[BaseLanguageModel, BaseLLM]:
        if not openai_api_base:
            openai_api_base = "https://api.openai.com/v1"
        return ChatOpenAI(
            max_tokens=max_tokens,
            model_kwargs=model_kwargs,
            model=model_name,
            base_url=openai_api_base,
            api_key=openai_api_key,
            temperature=temperature,
        )

chatHistory.template:
用中文回答问题：
历史消息：[]
问题：介绍太阳黑子

chatHistory.message:
太阳黑子是太阳表面上的一种现象，它们是太阳表面温度相对较低的区域，因此看起来比周围的区域暗淡。太阳黑子的形成与太阳磁场的活动有关。太阳的磁场线在某些区域被扭曲和拉伸，这些区域的磁场强度增加，导致那里的热量传输受到阻碍，因此温度下降，形成了黑子。

太阳黑子通常呈现为较暗的中心区域，称为黑子本体（Umbra），周围有一个稍微亮一些的区域，称为黑子半影（Penumbra）。黑子的大小可以非常不同，从几百公里到数万公里不等。

太阳黑子的数量并不是
